channel.title: [Forum Question] change my username
channel.description:
is there a moderator or admin can change my username? or should I completely new account? would be a shame ...
grtz, Mr Tekkah

item.title: [Forum Question] change my username
item.dc:creator: @KoF KoF
item.description:
@KoF wrote:

Wintercanon:

Also I imagine if they agreed, they would only change your display name. You would still have to login with KoF. Keep your name, you’ll learn to like it again. Changing your name usually results in regret.

display name is acceptable for me :d

Read full topic

item.title: [Forum Question] change my username
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

Also I imagine if they agreed, they would only change your display name. You would still have to login with KoF. Keep your name, you’ll learn to like it again. Changing your name usually results in regret.

item.title: [Forum Question] change my username
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Mods used to be able to change their own names :\ However, name changes for normal members are almost never made. And yes, creating another account is against the rules.

Read full topic

item.title: [Forum Question] change my username
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:15, topic:376096”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=472031.msg3461545#msg3461545 date=1294521733]

Ahem…

Rule 4:
We only have one forum account per person, you can use the same account for Moparscape and Moparisthebest.

I don’t know the rules ARE from 29/01/2009 so they might be outdated…
[/quote]We have laws from hundreds of years ago, and they aren’t outdated
[/quote][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=472031.msg3461518#msg3461518 date=1294519975]

Ahem…

Rule 4:
We only have one forum account per person, you can use the same account for Moparscape and Moparisthebest.

I don’t know the rules ARE from 29/01/2009 so they might be outdated…

That doesn’t mean they’re out dated…

Which is why I said might[/quote]

Are you talking to David or me? Because all I said was that it doesn’t mean their outdated, they still could but it’s just a low chance, plus you should look at the last edit date and not the date the topic was posted.

Read full topic
